title: Cable Ready, Linen Closet, Oops Late Fee Forgiveness
posting_body: ['Cambridge Square Apartments in Southfield, Michigan, offers spacious one and two-bedroom floor plans within a lush, park-like setting.', 'Features include covered parking, laundry facilities, and central air conditioning.', 'Cambridge Square provides easy access to local expressways including I-696 and is just minutes from Birmingham, Royal Oak, Berkley and Ferndale and only two miles from both Beaumont and Providence Hospitals.', 'Call us today for your personal tour!', '-Automatic Payment Options Available', '-Dining Room', '-Hardwood', 'Flooring in Some Areas', '-Linen Closet', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Central Air Conditioning', '-Covered Parking', '-Oops Late Fee Forgiveness', '-Additional Storage', '-Dishwasher', '-Secured Entry with Intercom', '-Playground', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
